page.title: 14Fashion and Beauty
page.content: Make-up is worn by most ladies and a few men.In the 1980's earrings are very popular for both men and women. For young girls mini-dresses and leg warmers are very fashionable.Mix and match outfits are also worn a lot.For boys trousers,denims or shorts and pullovers are the usual form of clothing.Luminous gloves and socks are popular in winter.Ladies' evening wear is often very classy with brightly coloured fabrics.Leisure wear is comprised of jogging suits and shorts.Every day wear is usually a skirt and top or a dress.Men usually wear suits or trousers and jackets for work.In the summer shorts are sometimes worn for leisure.Slip-on shoes are worn for work.Trainers are popular as leisure footwear.
